channel.title: How to get tons of free stuff off iTunes (Someone test please)
channel.description:
Ok, I did this and it worked for me, but I'm not sure if it works for anyone else.
1. Go to a local grocery store/bank and buy a $25 visa or mastercard gift card. 2. Create a paypal account at www.paypal.com 3. Use that gift card you just bought as your credit card on your paypal account. 4. Go and spend all your money on the giftcard somewhere else. [u][b]**IMPORTANT**[/b][/u] Leave atleast 1 cent on your gift card! If you spend every last cent it will deny it no matter what... 5. Now go in your account in iTunes and choose Paypal as your payment option. 6. Follow the steps until you're finished changing your payment option. [u][b]**NOTE**[/b][/u] Check your e-mail when you're done with step 6, if it has an e-mail telling you that you made a billing agreement, then you did it right. 7. Now go buy stuff in iTunes. With me I just bought movies and tv shows and it let me download them all.
[i][b]Notes:[/b][/i] You might need a shopping cart, but I'm not sure. I had a shopping cart and it worked. I think you're paypal account can't be verified and NO BANK ACCOUNT! If you have a bank account it will just subtract money from there.

item.title: How to get tons of free stuff off iTunes (Someone test please)
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

then why can you download off of limewire or kazaa or or torrents, and they don’t come to your house and steal your computer for piracy and crap huh??? it doesn’t make any sense and they can’t trace a file from someones computer to a website then to a webhost to a computer…it’s too much work and i would cost them millions of dollars to get maybe 100 people when they won’t even win back 10 million from all the cases…its just not happening…

item.title: How to get tons of free stuff off iTunes (Someone test please)
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

You can download it off of itunes, save it to a flash drive, take the flash drive to another computer and upload it to a file hosting site, like:
-http://easy-share.com
-http://rapidshare.com
-http://megaupload.com

Then send us the link so we can get free music etc.

Files I’d like:

  • Tetris
  • Jackass (1 or 2 doesn’t matter)

Read full topic

@nathanator22 wrote:

[quote=“deoxys505, post:20, topic:80520”][quote author=sk8ter link=topic=118271.msg1249645#msg1249645 date=1178057006]
what the fuck…

i copied the link into my browser 2 weeks ago and it didnt work, said my topic was deleted…so i didnt come here anymore…

now i come here and everyone likes the idea? awesome!

btw, i tried this at several places, only works on iTunes that i know of =/

and i know why too!

apples a dumbass!

lol…

oh and i cant dl stuff and send it to you, cause a guy at another website told me they have this tracker thing in it so they would sue me and you lol

so if you want something, pm me the name of what you want + your iTunes email and ill gift it to you.
[/quote]lol!!! that guy is stupid!!! you can’t implement a tracker into a music or video file!!!

the file wouldn’t play music on anything like a cd player or an iPod or even your computer for that matter if there was a tracker in it!

oh well if you believe him…whatever…[/quote]
they dont put it in the file, its in the itunes software.

item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“sk8ter, post:1, topic:80520”]Ok, I did this and it worked for me, but I’m not sure if it works for anyone else.

  1. Go to a local grocery store/bank and buy a $25 visa or mastercard gift card.
  2. Create a paypal account at www.paypal.com
  3. Use that gift card you just bought as your credit card on your paypal account.
  4. Go and spend all your money on the giftcard somewhere else.
    IMPORTANT Leave atleast 1 cent on your gift card! If you spend every last cent it will deny it no matter what…
  5. Now go in your account in iTunes and choose Paypal as your payment option.
  6. Follow the steps until you’re finished changing your payment option.
    NOTE Check your e-mail when you’re done with step 6, if it has an e-mail telling you that you made a billing agreement, then you did it right.
  7. Now go buy stuff in iTunes. With me I just bought movies and tv shows and it let me download them all.

Notes:
You might need a shopping cart, but I’m not sure. I had a shopping cart and it worked.
I think you’re paypal account can’t be verified and NO BANK ACCOUNT!
If you have a bank account it will just subtract money from there.[/quote]would this work for ebay/runescape?

or like amazon.com etc???

item.title: How to get tons of free stuff off iTunes (Someone test please)
item.dc:creator: @sk8ter sk8ter
item.description:
@sk8ter wrote:

Ok, I did this and it worked for me, but I’m not sure if it works for anyone else.

  1. Go to a local grocery store/bank and buy a $25 visa or mastercard gift card.
  2. Create a paypal account at www.paypal.com
  3. Use that gift card you just bought as your credit card on your paypal account.
  4. Go and spend all your money on the giftcard somewhere else.
    IMPORTANT Leave atleast 1 cent on your gift card! If you spend every last cent it will deny it no matter what…
  5. Now go in your account in iTunes and choose Paypal as your payment option.
  6. Follow the steps until you’re finished changing your payment option.
    NOTE Check your e-mail when you’re done with step 6, if it has an e-mail telling you that you made a billing agreement, then you did it right.
  7. Now go buy stuff in iTunes. With me I just bought movies and tv shows and it let me download them all.

Notes:
You might need a shopping cart, but I’m not sure. I had a shopping cart and it worked.
I think you’re paypal account can’t be verified and NO BANK ACCOUNT!
If you have a bank account it will just subtract money from there.

Read full topic
